thread.title: 21 Things You’ll Only Get If You’ve Given Up Wearing High Heels Entirely
thread.title_full: 21 Things You’ll Only Get If You’ve Given Up Wearing High Heels Entirely

author: Crystal Ro
title: 21 Things You’ll Only Get If You’ve Given Up Wearing High Heels Entirely
text:
View this image ›
alexa_go 10585395 2. You often thought, “Honestly? The higher, the better.” View this image ›
Trainable / Via imgur.com ID: 10585400 3. And it was RARE to see you anywhere without heels on. View this image ›
acrazycatlady 10585877 4. Because you felt pretty indestructible when wearing heels. View this image ›
LadyTotesMcGoats / Via imgur.com ID: 10585421 5. Frankly, you just assumed you’d be rockin’ those sky highs forever. View this image ›
hanna_bcn 10585451 6. But, you found wearing high heels wasn’t without its struggles… View this image ›
fashion_loveee01 10585404 7. …seriously. View this image ›
abc7newsbayarea 10585416 8. And, you know, pain… View this image ›
missauburn14 ID: 10586030 9. …particularly if you’re a touch ~clumsy~. View this image ›
__eleanorquance 10585991 10. And then you started to think, “Wait, WHY am I doing this to my poor feet?!” View this image ›
CurveBeam pedCAT / Via youtube.com ID: 10585469 11. So you said “goodbye” to your high-heel-wearing days and welcomed the era of flats. View this image ›
sdormanfitness 10585477 12. Sure, at first you were like, “Oh man, flat shoes aren’t as ~fun~ as heels.” View this image ›
lena_konichiwa 10585482 13. But then you realized they can actually be as much, if not MORE, fun than heels. View this image ›
niki_loves_fashion 10585485 14. And, TBH, your flats are just as pretty as a nice pair of heels, too. View this image ›
diane_cams 10586122 15. You’re basically a low-key expert on making flats look chic AF. View this image ›
arianneaneng 10585502 16. Although you weirdly still own a lot of your old heels (they’ll EVENTUALLY make it to Goodwill). View this image ›
bethann02 10586279 17. On a very, very RARE occasion you might wear a pair of heels again. View this image ›
lifeoflayna / Whisper 10585506 18. But you can never wait to get back in your comfy shoes ASAP. View this image ›
chfandrea 10585510 19. You still appreciate a beautiful pair of heels and other people who rock the heck out of them. View this image ›
bealaarnima 10586211 20. And sometimes you find it hard to resist the urge to try on a cute pair now and then. View this image ›
jcfernandez24 10586271 21. But you know, deep down, you won’t be going back to high heels full time ever again because THIS is your new happy place. View this image ›
lise_xoxo 10585490
